welcome_message_body: Welcome to Topsham, a charming town known for its rich history, picturesque views, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at NAS Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at NAS Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
